author: Al Jazeera
title: US farmers at risk of coronavirus
description: Farmers in Midwest fear shortages of food and labour if virus spreads into their rural communities.
content:
Farmers in the United States are regarded as being in a high-risk group for the coronavirus pandemic.
That is despite working in the vast, open fields of the so-called "farm belt" in the Midwest.
Farmers there fear shortages of food and labour if the virus … [+85 chars]
